document.full_text: paul reiser had the unfortunate experience of being trotted out on stage before the los angeles press corp. mere minutes after the ratings for his return to television came through with a dud.
document.title: paul reiser upbeat about show despite poor ratings
lines_and_colors: paul reiser had the unfortunate experience of being trotted out on stage before the los angeles press corp. mere minutes after the ratings for his return to television came through with a dud.
